Html:
The stats on my armoury don't match Rawr once I import my character.

                         Armoury      Rawr
Health                16325        15825
Stamina               1002            952 - obviously :)
Spell Power         2113          2050

The other stats seem to be fine so I'm a bit confused. I've checked my buffs, talents etc but can't see anything obvious. Apologies if this has already been covered but I've looked through the other posts and can't see anything.

Any help/advice would be appreciated as it's an awesome tool to use. If it helps my character is called Dac on the Aggramar EU server.

Cheers.
The health difference is because of mining, you didn't select toughness in the Rawr buffs tab.
Ah thanks Ermad, totally forgot about that. Thanks for the help.
